name: jphdevsf-site
observations: POC website demonstrating modern full-stack development using Next.js App Router with Storyblok headless CMS
Deployed to Netlify free-tier with edge functions
Components in src/components/: Card.jsx, Feature.jsx, Grid.jsx, Hero.jsx, Link.jsx, Page.jsx, StoryblokProvider.jsx, TextBanner.jsx, TextGroup.jsx
Netlify edge functions: netlify/edge-functions/cache-demo.ts (1-hour TTL demo), cache-page.ts (/* page caching)
Configuration files: next.config.mjs, tailwind.config.js, postcss.config.mjs, biome.json, netlify.toml
npm scripts: dev, build, start, lint (Biome), format (Biome)

name: Next.js
observations: React framework for full-stack web apps with SSR & SSG
next.config.mjs exposes Storyblok env vars publicly

name: Storyblok
observations: Public token used for live preview

name: Netlify
observations: Automatic deployment on push to main GitHub branch
Edge functions configured in netlify.toml: /api/cache-demo -> cache-demo, /* -> cache-page

name: TailwindCSS
observations: tailwind.config.js (noted as unused in V4 but present)

name: Biome
observations: Fast linter and formatter for JS/TS
Commands: npm run lint, npm run format
